mean_en: the work of collecting and writing news stories for newspapers, magazines, radio, television or online news sites; the news stories that are written
sentence: They work in journalism and broadcast news as anchors.
sentence_trans: 他们从事新闻行业，作为主播播报新闻。
word_etyma: journal日报 ＋ ism名词后缀 → journalism新闻业
